channel.title: Rate and last update times also a working archieve topic for scar
channel.description: So I think searching up-to-date scar scripts that are usefull are hard to find. So I thought there should be atleast an update to the scar scripts topic that would say when it has been updated and maybe user rating (*-***** maybe?) or you could do some cool ass scripts to the forums but it would be easier this way :).

item.title: Rate and last update times also a working archieve topic for scar
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

whats the point on looking for up-to-date scripts for an out-of-date cheat? :\

Read full topic
item.source: Rate and last update times also a working archieve topic for scar

item.title: Rate and last update times also a working archieve topic for scar
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

The problem with something like this is, ratings will always stay, and the posts to verify the scripts that they’re up-to-date will always stay, rs will always update and scripts will always stop working for the current runescape at one point. Making an up-to-date script section requires a dedicated team to test scripts after each update, and there seems to be little scripting going on here.

I suggest you head over to the SRL forums, you’ll have better luck over there, since there are a lot more people making up-to-date scripts.

Read full topic
item.source: Rate and last update times also a working archieve topic for scar

item.title: Rate and last update times also a working archieve topic for scar
item.dc:creator: @chef_autoer chef_autoer
item.description:
@chef_autoer wrote:

I really dont trust my activity so much to start a topic like this… I could assist someone else but not start my own.

Read full topic
item.source: Rate and last update times also a working archieve topic for scar

item.title: Rate and last update times also a working archieve topic for scar
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Good to see your looking for ways to improve the forum, why don’t you start this off your self to impress the community, you can start a topic titled “Up-to-date scripts & Ratings” or similar, and link to working scripts in a large post with ratings for each one next to the link. Other people can help you update it and voila your problem is solved.

Read full topic
item.source: Rate and last update times also a working archieve topic for scar
